body: This elaborately decorated ring is crafted with the design of a fierce dragon wrapped greedily around a shining gemstone. It grants the wearer a +5 competence bonus on all Craft (traps) and Disable Device checks. Even if he has no ranks in these skills, the wearer may make Craft (traps) and Disable Device checks as if he were trained in them.
name: Ring of Maniacal Devices
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Rings/Rods and Staves/Rings/Ring of Maniacal Devices
